home.title: SETI Solo Helper
home.play1: Play a SETI solo game against a rival research institution.
home.play2: This application replaces the rival action cards and player board and guides you through the game and solo ruleset. It supports all difficult levels.

setupGame.title: Setup Game
setupGame.setup2Players: Set up the game for two players.
setupGame.rivalPieces: Give the rival all pieces of one color.
setupGame.componentsNotRequired: He does not need the action cards, player board, score counter or publicity marker.

objectiveStack.title: Prepare the objectives stack:
objectiveStack.top: Top: Randomly select and shuffle {count} x Level 1 objectives.
objectiveStack.middle: Middle: Randomly select and shuffle {count} x Level 2 objectives.
objectiveStack.bottom: Bottom: Randomly select and shuffle {count} x Level 3 objectives.
objectiveStack.draw: Reveal the top 3 tiles of the objective stack.

ruleChanges.title: Rule Changes
ruleChanges.resources: Resources: Your rival does not keep track of resources. Instead, whenever an effect on the game board gives your rival resources, enter them in the application at the end of each turn. The application automatically manages the rival's progress. Effects from rival action cards are managed by the application automatically.
ruleChanges.objectives: Objectives: At the end of your turn, move all completed objectives into a completed-objectives pile near your board and replace them with new ones from the stack. You will always have 3 objectives to work on until the stack runs out.

roundTurnPlayer.passConfirm: Pass and drop out of the action phase?

roundTurnBot.pass:
The Rival passes.
Remove the top card from the end-of-round stack.

objectives.title: Objectives: You need to discard {count} completed objectives, if possible

gameEnd.title: End of Game

objectives.title: Objectives: Your rival scores VP for each uncompleted objective (from the row and those still in the stack)

gameEnd.finalScoreBot: Final Score of your Rival: {count} VP

finalScoring.title: Final scoring (only you):
finalScoring.scoringCards: Score points for your end-of-game scoring cards
finalScoring.goldScoringTiles: Score points for your gold scoring tiles
finalScoring.alienSpecies: Some alien species may add one more scoring step

botResources.gainThisTurn: Rival gains this turn from the game board:

botReachedMilestones.neutral: The rival reached a neutral milestone on score {score}.
botReachedMilestones.gold:
The rival reached a gold milestone on score {score}.
He claims the first, most valuable free spot on a gold tile.

speciesDiscovery.title: Discover Species
speciesDiscovery.alreadyDiscovered: Please select the species already discovered:

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Refresh Application
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: The application was updated - do you want to refresh to use the latest version?
